noActiveConversation: Select a conversation or start a new one.
emptyChatDescription: Send a message to start a conversation with the Wisdar assistant.
loginPageDescription: Log in to your Wisdar Chat account
registerPageDescription: Fill in the details to join.
userManagementDescription: Assign specific AI models that each user is allowed to access.
modelManagementDescription: Add or remove AI models and manage their API keys. This feature will be implemented next.
promptManagementDescription: Edit the system prompt for each AI model. This feature will be implemented next.
adminUserListCaption: A list of all users and their assigned AI models.
simulatedAssistantResponseWithModel: Here is a simulated response using {{modelName}}.
audioPlayerNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
audioRecordingNotSupportedError: Audio recording is not supported by your browser.
microphonePermissionDeniedError: Microphone permission was denied. Please enable it in your browser settings.
recordingFailedError: Voice recording failed. Please try again.
